sentence: Many eyes are on Georgia as a microcosm of the "Mar-a-Lago Machine" in action, where Trump has waged a particularly ugly crusade against GOP Governor Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensberger, along with anyone associated with them, endorsing their challengers and insisting that all GOP candidates running for any office sign off on the Big Lie.
author: Heather Digby Parton
title: Does Trump still have the juice? His spotty endorsement record suggests decline

sentence: In contrast, Republican Georgia Governor Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger, both frequent targets of the former president for refusing to overturn his 2020 loss to President Joe Biden, easily defeated Trump-backed candidates David Perdue and Jody Hice in their primaries.
author: Aila Slisco
title: God, Not Trump, Inspired Herschel Walker to Run for Office, NFL Star Says
